description:
the prospect of remaking Resident Evil 5 presents an exciting opportunity to breathe new life into a classic RE title, while also addressing its shortcomings. Brett Medlock dives into what he would want to see from a RE5 remake if Capcom were to tackle remaking the game in 2024.
